contentrichtext.text: {{no footnotes|date=January 2013}} [[Image:Bayrou Bercy 2007-04-18 n18.jpg|thumb|right|200px|Vincent Lindon in 2007]] '''Vincent Lindon''' (born 15 July 1959 in [[Boulogne-Billancourt]], [[Hauts-de-Seine]]) is a [[French people|French]] [[actor]] who has been active for more than 25 years. Lindon was a lover of [[Caroline, Princess of Hanover|Princess Caroline of Monaco]] from 1990 to 1995.
